GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
clocksource: hyper-v: unexport __init-annotated hv_init_clocksource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 937fcbb55a1e48a6422e87e8f49422c92265f102, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit dd2cb348613b44f9d948b068775e159aad298599. For more details please see the references link.
